definition: An electronic device for storing and processing data, typically in binary form, according to instructions given to it in a variable program.
A covering for the foot, typically made of leather, having a sturdy sole and not reaching above the ankle.
A regular gathering of people for the purchase and sale of provisions, livestock, and other commodities.
A new or unexperienced person, someone who does not know the rules of a website, or has only recently joined. A wordplay on newbie.
An activity that one engages in for amusement or fun.
A person who sets up a business or businesses, taking on financial risks in the hope of profit.
Something that has been achieved successfully.
The denial and rejection of a doctrine or belief.
of or relating to charitable giving.
A person who tries to please someone to gain an advantage.
